pageContext.claim: “We're also speaking to the EPA, and they're all ready to go. As soon as I sign this, they're ready to go. So the big problem was the federal approvals. They were un-gettable and now they're very gettable.”
pageContext.analysis: Part of the problem with farmers obtaining more water may have been federal approvals, but state regulations that balance the needs of multiple constituencies were also at play. It's unclear how Trump's executive order will impact water rights.
